sentences.sContent: Europe itself pays a stiff price for using this trick, in antidumping duties ultimately paid by consumers that are higher than they otherwise would be.
sentences.sContent_eng: Europe itself pays a stiff price for using this trick, in antidumping duties ultimately paid by consumers that are higher than they otherwise would be.
sentences.sCn: 欧盟这样玩技巧，自己也付出了代价，因为额外高出来的反倾销关税部分最终还是由消费者承担的。

sentences.sContent: Beijing could offer additional market opening of its own in exchange for a change of Brussels antidumping policy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beijing could offer additional market opening of its own in exchange for a change of Brussels antidumping policy.
sentences.sCn: 北京也可以向欧洲提供更多的自身市场的开放，以使布鲁塞尔改变反倾销的政策。
